Notes.Text:
This update for freeradius-server fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:
- CVE-2017-10981: DHCP - Fix memory leak in fr_dhcp_decode(). (bnc#1049086)
- CVE-2017-10982: Fix buffer over-read in fr_dhcp_decode_options(). (bsc#1049086)
- CVE-2017-10983: Fix read overflow when decoding option 63. (bnc#1049086)
- CVE-2017-10978: Fix read / write overflow in make_secret(). (bnc#1049086)
- CVE-2017-10979: Fix write overflow in rad_coalesce(). (bsc#1049086)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: An FR-GV-201 issue in FreeRADIUS 2.x before 2.2.10 and 3.x before 3.0.15 allows "Read / write overflow in make_secret()" and a denial of service.

Vulnerabilities.Description: An FR-GV-202 issue in FreeRADIUS 2.x before 2.2.10 allows "Write overflow in rad_coalesce()" - this allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.
